title: Natural Remedies & Ancient Healing with Dr. Josh Axe
description:
Dr. Axe teaches us how to harness medicinal herbs, foods, and powerful mind-body practices to heal your body from the inside out. Learn to naturally manage dozens of conditions from digestive health and autoimmune diseases, to fighting viral infections and thyroid conditions.

Guest Links:

Dr. Axe’s new book, Ancient Remedies: draxe.com/ancientremedies 

IG and FB: @drjoshaxe


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsor:

FITTRACK.com/JILLIAN for 50% off + an additional 30% off with code Build30 (limited time)


You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian
